=Road Map for the Android application=
This road map is a schedule for what's coming up in the next few versions. The content for all next versions defined in here is fixed and will not change any more (or at least not much).

For more information on our release strategy you can read the [ReleaseStrategy Release Strategy] document on the wiki.

==Releases==
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.16 Milestone-Release1.1.16]===
 * Bugs:
  * Notification for ongoing TR cannot be expanded on S3 (issue 230)
  * Recreate ongoing notification after reboot or upgrade (issue 231)
  * Adding TR manually always shows all of the projects and tasks (no taking into account the show finished parameter) (issue 232)
  * Crash when editing project and task of TR (issue 239)
  * Resetting the application does not remove ongoing TR notification (issue 245)
  * Adding a widget fails and sometimes when doing punch out also fails (issue 247)
 * Enhancement:
  * Replace the custom ActionBar with the ActionBarSherlock framework (issue 200)
  * Add advanced settings (issue 216)
  * Update showcase view for new layout with slide-in menu (issue 234)
  * clear sync history (issue 235)
  * Manual Add TR - Increase end date with an hour (issue 244)
 * New Feature:
  * Replace the dashboard with a slide-in menu (issue 199)
  * Start and end TR with the Geo Fences from the Play Services (issue 246)
  * Start and end TR base on WiFi networks (issue 248)
  * Start and end TR based on date and times (recurring) (issue 251)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.2.0 Milestone-Release1.2.0]===
 * Enhancement:
  * Block all input during synchronization (issue 184)
  * Limit number of backup files (issue 237)
 * New Feature:
  * Add a calendar day- and week-view for the Time Registration overview (issue 201)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.2.1 Milestone-Release1.2.1]===
===Milestone-Releasex.x.x===
 * Enhancement:
  * Customers module (issue 38)
  * Hourly rates for projects (issue 39)
  * Extra costs/expenses for projects and tasks (issue 41)
 * New Feature:
  * Add costs, expenses and rates to the reporting module (issue 121)
  * Add customers to the reporting module (issue 122)

More to come...
